{"event":["update"],"email_to":"[11287 show=814]","cc":"","bcc":"","from":"[sitename] <[admin_email]>","reply_to":"","email_subject":"Vehicle Request Actioned","email_message":"

Hi [11287],

rn

Your vehicle request has been actioned.

rn

The following booking notes have been added and any additional information will be sent by email.

rn

[11308]

rn

As a reminder, you have agreed, on receipt of the vehicle, to send full vehicle details ie vehicle reg, make/model, start and end date & driver name to ecologybusinesssupport@rskbiocensus.com so this can be added to the Motor Insurance Database. I realise that if I do not send these details the vehicle WILL NOT be insured.

rn

If you have any queries please email ecologybusinesssupport@rskbiocensus.com with the booking reference [id].rn

This is the information from the original booking request:

rn
